attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I consider that the lanes that have been alocated to Buses, known as Bus lanes, should be scrapped and handed back to all the other motorist, who have already PAID for these lanes in their Road Car, Fuel & every other Taxes, that get imposed on Motorist

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
